actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Packaging and Labeling Act to provide for the regulation of oversized and and excessive packaging of consumer commodities.

summary.text: Packaging Conservation Act - States that the purpose of this Act is to conserve natural resources and prevent the deception of consumers engendered by oversized and excessive packaging. Authorizes the making of regulations under the Fair Packaging and Labeling Act to prevent the utilization of packages which are larger or more extensive than necessary to enclose the commodity they contain.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Packaging and Labeling Act to provide for the regulation of oversized and and excessive packaging of consumer commodities.
